Objective : To observe the retinal function of macular disease with multi focal electroretinogram ( M ERG ).
目的: 应用多焦视网膜电图 ( MERG ) 观察视网膜功能.
Purpose: Discussing the testing procedure of multifocal electroretinography ( ERG ).
目的: 探讨多焦视网膜电图 ( multifocalelectroretinography,MERG ) 测定过程的步骤及注意事项.
